Constructors

MenuAction(int, string, MenuType, MenuType)

Sets Id to id, Name to description, Menu to menu and NextMenu to nextMenu.

public MenuAction(int id, string description, MenuType menu, MenuType nextMenu)

Parameters

id int

Unique identification number of action.

description string

Description of action that will by displayed in menu.

menu MenuType

Type of menu that this item is a part of.

nextMenu MenuType

Menu that will be displayed after action described by this item will be performed.
